abstract: Has Palm stopped battling Apple over whether or not Pre and Pixi owners can synchronize their handsets with iTunes?
snippet: Has Palm stopped battling Apple over whether or not Pre and Pixi owners can synchronize their handsets with iTunes?
lead_paragraph: Palm’s latest update to its mobile operating system now allows owners of the Pre and Pixi to use Yahoo’s instant messaging client and watch YouTube videos in wide screen view, among other things.

headline.main: Palm Drops iTunes Workaround, for Now
